coreAttributes.name: scarf
coreAttributes.description: A plain, unisex scarf. While some scarves are worn just for fashion, this one is made out of a soft, woolly fabric, making it practical for keeping the wearer warm on cold days or nights.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before wrapping the scarf around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unwrap)] [npc.her] scarf, before taking it off from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unwrap)] [npc2.namePos] scarf, before taking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unwrap)] [npc2.namePos] scarf, before yanking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
